subject: Missing order
description_text:
Hello 
I ordered 2 objects from you and received juste one I saw that the other one was out of stick after buying it thaught maybe that’s why I didn’t get it but niw it is that’s my order number 
By the way yes it’s still saying delivered partially 

SSN2007

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Ramy Boudjadja,  Please provide a photo so we can confirm which part is damaged and whether anything was missing from the shipment.

Hello, the older model of white elastomer you purchased has been discontinued. We can either issue a refund or send you the newer model of white elastomer. Additionally, what issues have you encountered with the hydraulic damper you purchased?

I ‘ll take the new one and no there is no problem with the other item it’s juste the elastomer that was missing 
Thank you 
Sent from my iPhone

>
